body:
As of now `clingo-bootstrap`:
- [x] is built in Release mode 
- [x] uses GCC options to link libstdc++ and libgcc statically on Linux
- [x] uses Apple Clang `-mmacosx-min-version` option on Darwin 
- [x] points CMake to the Python executable associated with the python spec in the DAG (requires CMake >= 3.16.0)
title: clingo: added a package with option for bootstrapping clingo
